formDescription: Step 3 - Technical Information - Government and First Nation Fee Exemption Request

V1IsEligibleForFeeExemption.title: Do you belong to, are you applying on behalf of, or are you an eligible government or First Nation entity for fee exemption?
V1IsEligibleForFeeExemption.description:
Do you belong to, are you applying on behalf of, or are you:
• A provincial government ministry
• The Government of Canada
• A First Nation for water use on reserve land
• A person applying to use water on Treaty Lands
• A Nisga'a citizen
• An entity applying to use water from the Nisga'a Water Reservation?
